summary: This is a conversion of Bikini Trouble - UNP UNPB 7B MTM BBP BBPx TBBP by MrTroubleMaker converted to fit CHSBHC body.
descriptionHtml:
..................[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2lmmjbl.jpg[/IMG]..................

============================Description============================
This is a conversion of Bikini Trouble - UNP UNPB 7B MTM BBP BBPx TBBP by MrTroubleMaker converted to fit CHSBHC body.
28 Bikinis Standalone Craftable. With working weight slider.

Uses leather and leather strips at the forge (hide).
Optional updates for 1.2
Simply added a "z" to the name so it will be lowest on the list.
Light Armor (upgradable) options.

Full Bikini Light Armor 18
Bikini Top Light Armor 9
Bikini Bottom Light Armor 9

Full Bikini uses biped 32
Bikini Top uses biped 32
Bikini Bottom uses biped 45

Same biped values that Brokefoot used for his Mashup.

Want to use a custom texture? It will replace the "Natural" version, place in here with these names.

dataTexturesclothesBikini-Troublebikini.dds
dataTexturesclothesBikini-Troublebikini_n.dds
Use this for semi transparent texture. It will replace the "T-Natural" version.

dataTexturesclothesBikini-Troubletbikini.dds
dataTexturesclothesBikini-Troubletbikini_n.dds

Install
======
Copy the contents of the archive in your SkyrimData folder
or use NMM

Recommended:
========================
CHSBHC body mod and BBP -Breast and Butt Physics
FNIS Behavior Files and Generator 4.0.2
CBBE-CHSBHC-UNP-ADEC-Human Argonian Khajiit Texture-4096
NoMaaM Breathing Idles BBB
NoMaaM Walk BBB - inverse orientation
TBBP main file v.1.01 by Dragonfly

Credits and thanks:
- CHSBHC body mod and BBP by CherryHotaling
- Bikini Trouble - UNP UNPB 7B MTM BBP BBPx TBBP by MrTroubleMaker
